name: Suburbia (Spooky)
description:
** I do not own the music, all music from Undertale with credits to Toby Fox. **

If it fades to black and there's no dialog press the → arrow to trigger more.

-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-

Spooky completed the demo of her pixel art based rpg adventure game set in Australian “Suburbia” for her Class 12 Independent Project. This game was conceptualised as a way of creating and exploring new characters within a new storytelling medium. 

“Suburbia” follows the main character, Casey, as they return to their hometown for their final years of high school. 

Suburbia is a game of reconnected friendships, of exploring escapism but all with the threat and mystery of something sinister lurking underneath.

-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-

Made with bitsy! https://www.bitsy.org/#0,0  
and also these hacks,

Character portraits: https://github.com/seleb/bitsy-hacks/blob/main/dist/character-portraits.js

Pixsy: https://ruin.itch.io/pixsy

Bitsy Muse: https://github.com/seleb/bitsy-hacks/blob/main/dist/bitsymuse.js

-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-

This is just a demo for a larger game I planned on making, but didn't get the time to as I had to finish this as my final for year 12.

Special thanks to my amazing mentor Cecile Richard for guiding me through the process of making this game and inspiring me the entire time.
https://haraiva.itch.io/
https://www.cecile-richard.com/
